sentences.en: Do not jeer at the misfortunes of others.
Do not jeer at the mistakes or misfortunes of others.
sentences.cn: 不要嘲笑别人的错误或不幸.

sentences.en: Don't jeer at the mistake of others.
sentences.cn: 不要对别人的错误嘲笑.

sentences.en: Don't jeer at the person who came last in the race - it's very unkind.
sentences.cn: 不要嘲笑赛跑中跑在最后的人,这是很不友善的.

sentences.en: He looked over the counter at Leo , and Leo watched him with a weary, brittle jeer.
sentences.cn: 他的两眼越过柜台向利奥望去, 而后者则挂着一丝懒洋洋 、 冷冰冰的讥笑瞧着他.

sentences.en: He was stabbed to the heart by the girl's jeer.
sentences.cn: 那女孩的嘲讽深深地刺伤了他的心.

sentences.en: I didn't come here today to jeer: I want to give advice.
sentences.cn: 我今天到这儿来不是为了讽刺挖苦，我是想提些建议。

sentences.en: Look at those saddos going to the Royal Opera House, I would jeer.
sentences.cn: 看到那些去皇家歌剧院的蠢家伙，我会不屑一顾。

sentences.en: Please don't jeer at my efforts.
Stop making a mock and a jeer out of other people's business.
The children liked to jeer at the awkward student.
sentences.cn: 孩子们喜欢嘲笑笨拙的学生.

sentences.en: The President was booed and jeered by a crowd of protesters.
sentences.cn: 总统被一群抗议者报以嘘声和嘲笑。

sentences.en: They all jeer at the foolish speaker.
sentences.cn: 他们都嘲笑那个愚蠢的演说者.

sentences.en: Using one thumb to point at others implies one's contempt or jeer.
sentences.cn: 用拇指人往往含有嘲弄的意思.

sentences.en: You can whistle, jeer and yarn at us: shame on China!
sentences.cn: 你可以吹口哨, 嘲笑,向我们大喊: 中国不要脸!

sentences.en: You may jeer, but can you do any better?
sentences.cn: 你可以“讥笑”, 但你能做得更好 吗 ?

trans.tran_en: to laugh at someone or shout unkind things at them in a way that shows you do not respect them
